code: import React from'react';import Title from'./Title';import{tours}from'../data';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Tours=function Tours(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"section",id:"tours",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Title,{title:"Featured",subTitle:"Tours"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"section-center featured-center",children:tours.map(function(tour){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("article",{className:"tour-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"tour-img-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:tour.image,className:"tour-img",alt:tour.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"tour-date",children:[tour.date,"0"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"tour-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"tour-title",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:tour.title})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:tour.info}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"tour-footer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-map"})})," ",tour.location]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[tour.duration," days"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Starts from $",tour.cost]})]})]})]},tour.id);})})]});};export default Tours;
